2025-05-07.title: Goldman Boosts Forecast for US Inflation as Dollar Slides
2025-05-07.description: Economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. boosted their forecasts for US inflation this year and next, in part to account for a weaker dollar following the Trump administration’s tariff announcements.

2025-05-14.title: Trump Favors $40-$50 Oil, Goldman Says After Scrutinizing Posts
2025-05-14.description: US President Donald Trump appears to prefer oil prices between $40 and $50 a barrel, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc., citing an in-house analysis of his social-media posts on the topic.

2025-05-14.title: Empower to Offer Private Markets Investments to Retirement Plans
2025-05-14.description: Firm aligns with Apollo, Franklin Templeton, Goldman Sachs, Neuberger Berman, PIMCO, Partners Group and Sagard Nation’s second largest retirement plan provider opens private market investing to its 19 million plan participants1 GREENWOOD VILLAGE, Colo. — In a…

2025-05-13.title: ‘Bulldog’ Ex-Goldman Banker Answers Carney’s Call to Fix Canada Resources Sector
2025-05-13.description: The first time Timothy Hodgson was asked by Mark Carney to come to Ottawa, he left behind an investment banking career at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. that had seen him climb the ranks to lead its Canadian business.

2025-05-08.title: An $80 Billion UAE Firm Is Wooing Trump and Luring Wall Street
